description.value:
Used to improve Luminen Capacitors by acting as a battery. Do not gain fatigue when Luminen Capacitors are used, instead drain half of the internal reservoir. Takes on day to recharge.

Requirements

Requires Luminen Capacitors Cybernetic

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
description.summary: Used to improve Luminen Capacitors by acting as a battery. Do not gain fatigue when Luminen Capacitors are used, instead drain half of the internal reservoir. Takes on day to recharge.
